member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNet.FileProviders.EmbeddedFileProvider
member.summary: Looks up files using embedded resources in the specified assembly. This file provider is case sensitive.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.FileProviders.EmbeddedFileProvider.#ctor(System.Reflection.Assembly)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified assembly and empty base namespace.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.FileProviders.EmbeddedFileProvider.#ctor(System.Reflection.Assembly,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified assembly and base namespace.
member.param: The assembly that contains the embedded resources.
The base namespace that contains the embedded resources.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.FileProviders.EmbeddedFileProvider.GetFileInfo(System.String)
member.summary: Locates a file at the given path.
member.param: The path that identifies the file.
member.returns: The file information. Caller must check Exists property.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.FileProviders.EmbeddedFileProvider.GetDirectoryContents(System.String)
member.summary: Enumerate a directory at the given path, if any. This file provider uses a flat directory structure. Everything under the base namespace is considered to be one directory.
member.param: The path that identifies the directory
member.returns: Contents of the directory. Caller must check Exists property.

member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNet.FileProviders.PhysicalFileProvider
member.summary: Looks up files using the on-disk file system

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.FileProviders.PhysicalFileProvider.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of a PhysicalFileProvider at the given root directory.
member.param: The root directory. This should be an absolute path.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.FileProviders.PhysicalFileProvider.Root
member.summary: The root directory for this instance.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.FileProviders.PhysicalFileProvider.GetFileInfo(System.String)
member.summary: Locate a file at the given path by directly mapping path segments to physical directories.
member.param: A path under the root directory
member.returns: The file information. Caller must check Exists property.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.FileProviders.PhysicalFileProvider.GetDirectoryContents(System.String)
member.summary: Enumerate a directory at the given path, if any.
member.param: A path under the root directory
member.returns: Contents of the directory. Caller must check Exists property.
